titles.title: Natural Disaster Property Protection Act of 2023
Natural Disaster Property Protection Act of 2023
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the dollar threshold applicable to information reporting with respect to payments for qualified natural disaster expenses.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
Natural Disaster Property Protection Act of 2023
This bill increases from $600 to $5,000 the dollar threshold for information reporting of payments for qualified natural disaster expenses.
